title: (Lazbon) Bagaimana cara batalkan pengajuan lazbon lazada"
content: Hubungi pusat layanan call center lazada melalui Telepon WhatsApp di 082135333394. atau 08154036097, kemudian jelaskan dengan baik alasan kamu mau membatalkan pinjaman setelah di konfirmasi oleh customer service lakukan proses verifikasi yang di instruksikan oleh layanan Pusat lazada.
creator: lukmanferirival

title: Error in Rendering
content:
I am not sure if I asked this previously with another issue. Be that as it may, I will ask.

A few weeks ago I went into the Startup Menu to disable certain programs that I thought was slowing the system's startup. That was a couple weeks ago. I went over the startup items and disabled only those I do not use or need after starting my computer.

I use Yahoo as my homepage on the Firefox browser. On some of the photos associated with an article I get this error:

Error in rendering player

Error Code: 400-404 Session Id: rm7bfdr3 (Pls: 93a94693-7bc6-4c95-8398-99b65521dab2)

Why is this happening and how do I fix it? I will also attach a screen shot of a page with the error.

Thanks as always, Irv
creator: irn1922

creator: qsmia2008

title: Clear un-containered cookies and all data (Firefox Multi-Account Containers)
content:
With Firefox Multi-Account Containers I am able to contain cookies to specific containers. I can then individually clear storage and cookies for each container.

Sometimes I accidentally use an uncontainered tab. I have not found a way to clear uncontainered cookies and storage and not from my containers, as Clear browsing data and cookies clears it from everything. How can only clear everything not in a container? Please add a button which does this to Firefox Multi-Account Containers.

I would also like to see which container items in history are from. Currently clearing cookies and storage data from containers doesn't remove the items from history. I can imagine this is because if they are not separate, it would remove occurrences where they were opened uncontainered or in different containers.
creator: user2758963
